@dsmart that's the paragraph that unfortunately trips me up @Readdle https://t.co/W5ZWJAsAzN
@dsmart difference is: account info is stored by @Readdle on "off-shore" server - that's against current IT policies. I'll check for private
@dsmart iOS & macOS and am mostly stuck with https://t.co/HbQaZoewRe / Outlook. issue is that I can't grant 3rd parties any access @Readdle
@dsmart it looks great, unfortunately my workplace policies won't allow access to my email by this kind of app @Readdle
@dsmart yes, took digging through several pages, and it clearly is a service that collects tons of information :( @Readdle
@dsmart Is it an actual stand alone app or an additional cloud service that wants access to my inbox? not quite clear about this @Readdle
@serayamaouche yes, it is very hit miss with @Google's "AIs" - unfortunately no time to manuall fix things up :( @schneiderleonid
